description:
My entry for the "silent" bitsy jam. This is best played in full screen.

Script/hack credits:

  • palette maps by Dana Holdampf
  • avatar by room by Sean S. LeBlanc
  • dynamic background by Sean S. LeBlanc

These scripts can be found in github and in the bitsy discord server. The multi-frame animations are not a script, but I learned that was possible from wjhollyart's Bitsy Many-Frame Animation Test which itself is leagues ahead of what I used that knowledge for.

Check out my other bitsy jam games:

  • rat on the platform (rat jam)
  • life imitates art (echo jam)
  • The Helix Court (snail jam)
